CN.content:

Paragraph: AFM images of PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films were obtained to investigate their microphase separation behavior and the corresponding AFM height and phase images recorded in the tapping mode are shown in Figure 8.

Let's think step by step.

1. AFM (Atomic Force Microscopy)
2. PffBTT:P6 (PffBBn is likely a variant or abbreviation of this material)
3. PC71BM (Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PffBTT:P6 (PffBBn)
2. PC71BM

These are the material names explicitly mentioned in the paragraph.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: AFM images of PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films were obtained to investigate their microphase separation behavior and the corresponding AFM height and phase images recorded in the tapping mode are shown in Figure 8.

Let's think step by step.

1. AFM images: These are visual representations of data obtained using Atomic Force Microscopy. They are not physical properties, but rather data representations.
2. PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films: These are types of thin films made by blending PffBBn and PC71BM polymers. They are the subject of investigation in the paragraph.
3. microphase separation behavior: This is a property or characteristic of the PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films, specifically their ability to separate into distinct phases at the microscopic level.
4. AFM height images: These are images that represent the height variations of the surface of the PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films as measured by AFM.
5. AFM phase images: These are images that represent the phase or composition variations of the PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films as measured by AFM.
6. Figure 8: This is a visual representation of the data, specifically the AFM height and phase images of the PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films. It is not a property, but rather a representation of data.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. microphase separation behavior: This is a material property or characteristic of the PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films, specifically their ability to separate into distinct phases at the microscopic level.
2. AFM height images: These are data representations of the height variations of the surface of the PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films as measured by AFM.
3. AFM phase images: These are data representations of the phase or composition variations of the PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films as measured by AFM.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| microphase separation behavior of PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films |
| height variations of the surface of PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films (as measured by AFM) |
| composition variations of PffBBn : PC71BM blended thin films (as measured by AFM) |
